meanings.definition: The quality or state of being stupendous.
meanings.sent1: The stupendousnesses of the mountain range took my breath away.
meanings.sent2: Her artwork was full of stupendousnesses that left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent3: The clown exaggerated the stupendousnesses of his tiny car, fitting twenty clowns inside!
meanings.sent4: The stupendousnesses of the storm were like a fierce dragon roaring in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The movie's special effects created a world of stupendousnesses beyond imagination.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being extremely impressive or remarkable.
meanings.sent1: The team's victory was a testament to the stupendousnesses of their hard work.
meanings.sent2: The singer's voice had a natural stupendousnesses that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's cuteness reached new levels of stupendousnesses when it learned to do tricks.
meanings.sent4: The city's skyline at night had a twinkling stupendousnesses that seemed magical.
meanings.sent5: The explorer was in awe of the natural stupendousnesses of the vast canyon.
